com.vividsolutions.jcs.qa
Class FeatureSegmentCounter

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.qa.FeatureSegmentCounter
public class FeatureSegmentCounter
extends java.lang.Object

Keeps a count of distinct LineSegments (as a Map from LineSegments to counts). It can be used to retrieve a list of unique segments (up to point order). LineSegments are normalized before being counted (so the segment comparison is independent of point order).

Zero-length segments can be ignored if required. This is useful for handling geometries with repeated points.
